# orion-nav-menu

The nav menu component enables the user to navigate throughout the website or application.

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                                                              | Type      | Default |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `hasCloseIcon` | `has-close-icon` | Toggles visibility of the close icon in the right of the nav menu header | `boolean` | `false` |
| `isOpen`       | `is-open`        | Prop used to show/hide nav menu                                          | `boolean` | `false` |


## Events

| Event          | Description | Type               |
| -------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `navMenuClose` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                 | Description                                                    |
| ------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--orion-nav-menu-bg-color`          | Background color of nav-menu (default is #334e69)              |
| `--orion-nav-menu-color`             | Text color of nav-menu (default is #fff)                       |
| `--orion-nav-menu-top-value-desktop` | top starting position of nav-menu on desktop (default is 80px) |
| `--orion-nav-menu-top-value-mobile`  | top starting position of nav-menu on mobile (default is 60px)  |
| `--orion-nav-menu-width-desktop`     | Width of nav-menu on desktop (default is 414px)                |
| `--orion-nav-menu-width-mobile`      | Width of nav-menu on mobile (default is 100%)                  |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
